::Zarak-Scorponok::
   
  Zarak was in his humanoid Nebulon form, sitting on the shoulder of the now dorment form of Scorponk. Scorponk was in bot mode minus his head sitting at the conference table.
   
  Zarak: Use the clone with her signature. Rodimus will track it. Have it lead him close to us but not close enough to tip off our position. We set up an ambush at a designated point. Rodimus follows the clone there and we strike. Destroy the clone and capture the big Autobot legend.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Hydras:

"We have this good for nothing's clone to use, I suggest fake her death 
infront of Rodimus face in order break his spirit and capture him... 
Problem is how to do in order he goes to our old base... I accpet 
suggestions"
